## BCSRIF Project Summary

**Species Group:** Pacific Salmon  
**Location:** Bella Coola  
**Partners:** Simon Fraser University, Wild Salmon Centre  
**Organization:** Central Coast Indigenous Resource Alliance  
**Session(s):** Fisheries Monitoring And Harvest Methods  
**Presentation Date(s):** December 09, 2025  
**Speakers:** Megan Adams  
**Abstract:**  
This project will focus on designing and implementing a coordinated strategy to fill data gaps related to Central Coast salmon populations which will inform management measures to promote sustainable opportunities for marine and Food Social Ceremonial fisheries.   

**Collaborators:**  
Kyle Wilson (Simon Fraser University), Will Atlas (Wild Salmon Centre)
